Summary: serotonin activates 5-HT3 receptor (HTR3A, HTR3B, HTR3C, HTR3D, HTR3E). This interaction is inhibited by ondansetron.
serotonin activates 5-HT3 receptor (HTR3A, HTR3B, HTR3C, HTR3D, HTR3E).
Biochemical reaction from ondansetron to N-demethylondansetron.
Biochemical reaction from ondansetron to 6-hydroxyondansetron. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from ondansetron to 7-hydroxyondansetron. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A1, CYP2D6, CYP3A or CYP1A2.
Biochemical reaction from ondansetron to 8-hydroxyondansetron. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2, CYP1A1, CYP2D6 or CYP3A.
